cart

类 ShoppingCart

  • java.lang.Object
    • cart.ShoppingCart

  • public class ShoppingCart
extends java.lang.Object

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      ShoppingCart() 

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void addItem(Product product)
      Adds a ShoppingCartItem to the ShoppingCart's items list.
      void calculateTotal(java.lang.String surcharge)
      Calculates the total cost of the order.
      void clear()
      Empties the shopping cart.
      java.util.List<ShoppingCartItem> getItems()
      Returns the list of ShoppingCartItems.
      int getNumberOfItems()
      Returns the sum of quantities for all items maintained in shopping cart items list.
      double getSubtotal()
      Returns the sum of the product price multiplied by the quantity for all items in shopping cart list.
      double getTotal()
      Returns the total cost of the order for the given ShoppingCart instance.
      void update(Product product, java.lang.String quantity)
      Updates the ShoppingCartItem of the specified product to the specified quantity.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ShoppingCart

        public ShoppingCart()

    • 方法详细资料

      • addItem

        public void addItem(Product product)
        Adds a ShoppingCartItem to the ShoppingCart's items list. If item of the specified product already exists in shopping cart list, the quantity of that item is incremented.
        参数:
        product - the Product that defines the type of shopping cart item
        另请参阅:
        ShoppingCartItem

      • update

        public void update(Product product,
          java.lang.String quantity)
        Updates the ShoppingCartItem of the specified product to the specified quantity. If '0' is the given quantity, the ShoppingCartItem is removed from the ShoppingCart's items list.
        参数:
        product - the Product that defines the type of shopping cart item
        quantity - the number which the ShoppingCartItem is updated to
        另请参阅:
        ShoppingCartItem

      • getItems

        public java.util.List<ShoppingCartItem> getItems()
        Returns the list of ShoppingCartItems.
        返回:
        the items list
        另请参阅:
        ShoppingCartItem

      • getNumberOfItems

        public int getNumberOfItems()
        Returns the sum of quantities for all items maintained in shopping cart items list.
        返回:
        the number of items in shopping cart
        另请参阅:
        ShoppingCartItem

      • getSubtotal

        public double getSubtotal()
        Returns the sum of the product price multiplied by the quantity for all items in shopping cart list. This is the total cost excluding the surcharge.
        返回:
        the cost of all items times their quantities
        另请参阅:
        ShoppingCartItem

      • calculateTotal

        public void calculateTotal(java.lang.String surcharge)
        Calculates the total cost of the order. This method adds the subtotal to the designated surcharge and sets the total instance variable with the result.
        参数:
        surcharge - the designated surcharge for all orders
        另请参阅:
        ShoppingCartItem

      • getTotal

        public double getTotal()
        Returns the total cost of the order for the given ShoppingCart instance.
        返回:
        the cost of all items times their quantities plus surcharge

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Empties the shopping cart. All items are removed from the shopping cart items list, numberOfItems and total are reset to '0'.
        另请参阅:
        ShoppingCartItem
